channel.title: New Player Timer
channel.description:
Well I've got a PK Eco server, and see you start with a few barrows and 25m cash. It will be a good pk eco if i can make a timer to do this:
Not allow anything to be dropped, traded, nor to allow them to enter wildy for 15 minutes.
I've seen a server in cases where new players must wait 15 minutes to enter wilderness (so they cannt kill accs for cash) and it teles them straight out of wildy.
Edit: This is PI, Uncalled Attack v2 to be exact. (317 loading 474, not the 602 one.)

item.title: New Player Timer
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

There are loads of tutorials. Go look for one.

Read full topic
